biotools.summary: BM-BC is a Bayesian method of base calling for Solexa-GA sequencing data. The Bayesian method builds on a hierarchical model that accounts for three sources of noise in the data, which are known to affect the accuracy of the base calls: fading, phasing, and cross-talk between channels.

bioschemas.name: BM-BC
